content.question: Which of the following experiences most likely influenced the perspective conveyed in the passage?

choices.label: The increased centralization of power in the national legislature under the Articles of Confederation
Shay’s Rebellion, which was an armed response to the inability of the national government to address unjust economic state policies.
The tension between states relying on commerce and those relying on agriculture
Passage of the Stamp Act and other taxes during the revolutionary period

content.answer: Shay’s Rebellion, which was an armed response to the inability of the national government to address unjust economic state policies.

topic.text: 1.4: Challenges of the Articles of Confederation
